content: this easy prayer shawl crochet pattern uses simple stitch combinations this top-down triangle shawl works up quickly with super bulky yarn this pattern is designed to meet the donation requirements of project legacy shawls 1 a ravelry group that distributes handmade comfort items to people in a hospital palliative care unit this pattern is featured in the favecrafts national craft month celebration 2 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 3 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet slip_stitch crocheting flat in row increasing crocheting into chain spaces **skill level** easy **finished size** teen/adult 52 132 cm wingspan x 28 71 cm spine **materials** lion brand re-spun thick & quick 4 yarn 100% acrylic 5 oz/142 g 251 yd/230 m 3 skeins in 110at night sky *or approximately 510 yd 466 5 m in any super bulky weight yarn* us size m/9 mm crochet hook *or size needed to obtain gauge* yarn needle stitch marker **gauge** 9 double_crochet = 4 10 cm *exact gauge is not critical for this project * 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/project-legacy-shawls-2 2 https //www favecrafts com/most-popular-crafts/national-craft-month-2024 3 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/03/05/sawyer-easy-prayer-shawl-crochet-pattern/ 4 https //shrsl com/4ejtf
